entry.title: Prophecy

entry.title: There's Something So Lonesome About You
entry.summary:
Author: hoeforhoran28

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 76,136Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 1,268

Summary: "Your identity was supposed to be a secret. Not only to protect yourself (and probably least importantly yourself) but others. Your family, your friends. Everyone who stood a chance at being ripped apart by your decision to go out there everyday and put yourself in the crossfire.Not that Bruce had anyone to protect, besides Alfred. But it was still a fucking given."Or: Bruce has been Batman for two years and if he knew anything, it was that when you don a mask, you don it for a reason. An important reason that just doesn't seem to be as important to the rest of the League as it is to him. This is going to be a story about Bruce being coaxed into allowing others behind his carefully built walls. (Specifically one person.)

entry.title: Bonded by Blood
entry.summary:
Author: 3v3rl0ve

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 23,765Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 63

Summary: What if 'Clark Kent' as we know him, was born and raised on Krypton. What if the planet was destroyed on his 19th birthday, and this time, instead of Kal-el and Kara Zor-el being the only Kryptonians to survive, a much larger group of them do. Earth must learn to co-habitate with these new 'aliens' in their solar system. The Kryptonians must learn to control and not monopolise their extreme strength. What better way to do this then to arrange a marriage between the youngest surviving member of the Kryptonians, and the easily-controlled Gothamite billionaire play-boy.

entry.title: Power
entry.summary:
Author: ope-uh-oh (shortjacketlongskirt)

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 90,158Chapters: 18/?Kudos: 204

Summary: ‚ÄúOh, you do like to flirt, don‚Äôt you?‚Äù Lex accused almost playfully, if not for the sharklike emptiness in his eyes. Bruce sat back as the appetizer plates were taken away and replaced with the entr√©e: filet mignon in a mushroom gravy, served with truffles, asparagus, and black garlic potatoes. He couldn‚Äôt help but think Clark would have appreciated this. And he desperately wished he was here with him rather than Vicki. He flashed a playful grin at Lex. ‚ÄúFlirting is what makes the world go round, Lex. What is that quote attributed to Oscar Wilde? ‚ÄòEverything in the world is about sex except sex, which is about power‚Äô. It applies to everything. Make people think you want them, and you‚Äôve got the whole world in your hands.‚Äù After years of living in the closet, trying to ignore the truth, Bruce is finally cornered and is forced to come out in a very public way. This leads to a series of challenges, blending his public and private life in way he can‚Äôt escape.

entry.title: From Gotham with Love
entry.summary:
Author: anxiousdepressedintrovert

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 46,735Chapters: 15/?Kudos: 85

Summary: Martha and Thomas Wayne are Gotham‚Äôs golden couple‚Äîwealthy, admired, and untouchable. Their daughter, Beatrice, is the heart of their legacy. But one night shatters everything. The Waynes are murdered in cold blood, and young Beatrice vanishes without a trace. Two years later, she returns. Alive‚Äîbut not the same. Now, Gotham must face the mystery of the girl who came back... and the shadows that followed her home.

entry.title: Marigolds
entry.summary:
Author: Gurdis_XXIV

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 114,768Chapters: 54/?Kudos: 342

Summary: Bessie Brown lost everything in one night. Her parents vanished, she was far from home, and she had no choice but to eek out a living on the streets of Gotham. Fortunately, she found a partner-in-crime, Jason Todd. That is, until he disappears too. When she finds him again, it changes everything. Welcomed into a new family, she has choices to make about who she is, who she wants to be, and who she will become. She also has new relationships to consider. She only knows one thing for sure: she will never be alone again.This is a long-term romance story with mystery and action subplots, covering some canon events, but it is its own AU, so not all events follow canon.

entry.summary:
Author: battinscnz

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 219Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 10

Summary: When winter settles over Gotham in snowfall and silence, Bruce Wayne has no time to enjoy either. Another brutal article hits the tabloids, one after another - sharp, merciless, and written by the one man he cannot stand: Clark Kent of the Daily Planet. Clark has made a career out of dismantling Gotham‚Äôs beloved billionaire, and Bruce is tired of being reduced to headlines he never asked for. When circumstances back both men into a corner, a deal is struck: a temporary arrangement, a carefully staged romance, just long enough to calm the tabloids and get Clark the professional access he needs. They don‚Äôt like each other. They don‚Äôt trust each other. And sharing a public image - let alone a penthouse - was never part of the plan. But winter has a way of softening edges. Holiday events require hand-holding, whispered conversations, and appearances that feel far too real.And somewhere between the frostbitten tension and the late-night honesty, hatred begins to crack - revealing something warmer beneath the ice.

entry.title: Into the sky
entry.summary:
Author: queenseptienna

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 20,295Chapters: 4/5Kudos: 3

Summary: A.R.G.U.S. sends Peacemaker and Vigilante to Metropolis for a ‚Äúsimple diplomatic collaboration‚Äù with the Justice Gang.Translation: Amanda Waller wants them to pretend they‚Äôre professional, hide the fact that they‚Äôre dating, and not embarrass her in front of Superman, Batman, and the new roster of shiny competent heroes.It goes badly immediately.Superman is too nice, Batman hates them on sight, and Metropolis is being destabilized by alien tech that Peacemaker definitely should not be touching.Vigilante accidentally impresses Batman.Peacemaker gets jealous of literally everyone.The Justice Gang witnesses the world‚Äôs most accidental double date.When a dimensional rift tears open over the city, the four heroes are forced to work together ‚Äî with varying success, a lot of yelling, and one moment of unexpected brilliance from Vigilante that even Batman has to respect.Chaos, jealousy, teamwork, accidental domesticity, two couples figuring themselves out, and one exhausted Kryptonian trying not to hear Peacemaker and Vigilante having sex through the safehouse walls.
